filmography.title: Some Like It Hot
filmography.role_description: A ukulele-playing vocalist and heavy drinker in an all-female jazz band who unknowingly falls for a cross-dressing musician.
filmography.plot: Two male musicians witness a mob hit and flee the state in an all-female band disguised as women, but further complications set in.

filmography.title: The Seven Year Itch
filmography.role_description: A gorgeous but naive model who moves into the apartment upstairs from a married man whose family is away for the summer.
filmography.plot: A faithful husband is tempted by a beautiful neighbor who moves in upstairs while his family is away for the summer.

filmography.title: Bus Stop
filmography.role_description: A socially awkward saloon singer with dreams of Hollywood who is pursued by a boisterous, naive cowboy.
filmography.plot: A dramatic comedy about a rodeo cowboy who falls in love with a cafe singer and tries to take her away to his ranch in Montana.

filmography.title: The Prince and the Showgirl
filmography.role_description: An American showgirl in London who catches the eye of a stiff European Prince Regent and eventually charms him.
filmography.plot: An American showgirl becomes entangled in political intrigue when the Prince Regent of a foreign country attempts to seduce her.
filmography.awards: David di Donatello: Win – Best Foreign Actress; BAFTA: Nomination – Best Foreign Actress

filmography.title: Gentlemen Prefer Blondes
filmography.role_description: A diamond-loving showgirl who believes that marrying for money is the same as marrying for love.
filmography.plot: Two showgirls travel to Paris, pursued by a private detective hired by the wealthy father of one of the girls' fiancés.
filmography.awards: Iconic Performance ("Diamonds Are a Girl's Best Friend")

filmography.title: How to Marry a Millionaire
filmography.role_description: A near-sighted model who refuses to wear glasses in front of men, part of a trio scheming to marry wealthy husbands.
filmography.plot: Three women set out to find eligible millionaires to marry, but find true love in the process.

filmography.title: The Misfits
filmography.role_description: A sensitive, recently divorced woman who falls in with a group of aging cowboys and is horrified by their mustanging business.
filmography.plot: A divorcée falls for an over-the-hill cowboy who struggles to maintain his romantically independent lifestyle.
filmography.awards: Golden Globe: Win – World Film Favorite

filmography.title: Niagara
filmography.role_description: A femme fatale plotting to murder her older, jealous husband while vacationing at Niagara Falls.
filmography.plot: As two couples are visiting Niagara Falls, tensions between one wife and her husband reach the level of murder.

filmography.title: Don't Bother to Knock
filmography.role_description: A mentally unstable babysitter who endangers the child in her care while pursuing a pilot staying at the same hotel.
filmography.plot: A pilot staying at a hotel begins a romance with a babysitter, unaware that she is a dangerous mental patient.

filmography.title: River of No Return
filmography.role_description: A saloon singer who is forced to travel down a treacherous river on a raft with a widower and his young son.
filmography.plot: A farmer and his son rescue a saloon singer and a gambler from a river raft, but the gambler steals their horse and gun, leaving them defenseless.

filmography.title: All About Eve
filmography.role_description: A naive, aspiring actress described as a 'graduate of the Copacabana School of Dramatic Art'.
filmography.plot: An ingenue insinuates herself into the company of an established but aging stage actress and her circle of theater friends.

filmography.title: The Asphalt Jungle
filmography.role_description: The young, beautiful mistress of a corrupt lawyer involved in a major jewel heist.
filmography.plot: A major heist goes off as planned, until bad luck and double crosses cause everything to unravel.

filmography.title: There's No Business Like Show Business
filmography.role_description: A talented singer who joins a family vaudeville act and complicates the relationships within the family.
filmography.plot: The children of a husband-and-wife vaudeville team begin to go their own ways, with one son falling for a rising star.

filmography.title: Monkey Business
filmography.role_description: A secretary who becomes the object of affection for a scientist who has accidentally taken a youth serum.
filmography.plot: A chemist finds his personal and professional life turned upside down when one of his chimpanzees finds the fountain of youth.
filmography.awards: Golden Globe: Nomination – Best Actress (Ginger Rogers)

filmography.title: Clash by Night
filmography.role_description: A fish cannery worker who is the girlfriend of the protagonist's brother, providing a youthful contrast to the main drama.
filmography.plot: A woman returns to her fishing village hometown and settles down with a good-natured fisherman, but falls for his cynical friend.

filmography.title: We're Not Married!
filmography.role_description: A beauty queen contestant whose marriage is revealed to be invalid just as she wins the title of Mrs. Mississippi.
filmography.plot: Five couples discover that they are not legally married because the justice of the peace who performed their ceremonies did not have a valid license.

filmography.title: Love Nest
filmography.role_description: A former WAC who moves into an apartment building owned by her old war buddy, causing jealousy with his wife.
filmography.plot: An author returns from WWII and buys a run-down apartment building to get material for his new book.

filmography.title: As Young as You Feel
filmography.role_description: A beautiful secretary who unknowingly aids an older employee in his scheme to save his job.
filmography.plot: An older man is forced to retire at age 65, so he dyes his hair and impersonates the company president to reverse the policy.

filmography.title: Let's Make It Legal
filmography.role_description: A gorgeous model and gold-digger who sets her sights on a wealthy man involved in a divorce.
filmography.plot: A couple divorces after 20 years of marriage, but the husband tries to win his wife back before she marries an old flame.

filmography.title: Hometown Story
filmography.role_description: A secretary at a newspaper office who works for a disgruntled editor taking on big corporations.
filmography.plot: A defeated politician takes over his uncle's newspaper and uses it to attack the local industries he blames for his loss.

filmography.title: The Fireball
filmography.role_description: A groupie for a roller derby team who takes an interest in the brash new star skater.
filmography.plot: A runaway orphan becomes a roller-skating star but lets success go to his head, alienating his friends and teammates.

filmography.title: Right Cross
filmography.role_description: A stunning blonde who has a brief date with a sportswriter, appearing in an uncredited role.
filmography.plot: A champion boxer faces the end of his career due to a hand injury and struggles with his identity and relationships.

filmography.title: A Ticket to Tomahawk
filmography.role_description: A chorus girl and backing dancer who travels with a troupe on a train journey through the Old West.
filmography.plot: A salesman tries to get a narrow-gauge train to Tomahawk, Colorado on time to save the railroad's franchise, battling Indians and bad guys.

filmography.title: Love Happy
filmography.role_description: A stunning client who walks into a detective's office, causing him to lose his composure; a small but memorable walk-on.
filmography.plot: The Marx Brothers get mixed up in a plot involving stolen diamonds and a struggling Broadway musical.

filmography.title: Ladies of the Chorus
filmography.role_description: A chorus girl who becomes a featured burlesque singer and falls in love with a wealthy man, fearing his mother's disapproval.
filmography.plot: A mother and daughter both work as chorus girls, but the mother tries to protect her daughter from the pitfalls of the profession.
